title: Sketchbook, "Signs Taken for Poems That Don't Wonder", started July 25, 1999– finished January 18, 2000
title_raw: "Signs Taken for Poems That Don't Wonder"
medium: Ball point pen and black, red, green, and blue inks, graphite on paper
signed: Signed and dated in graphite, front end-page, upper right corner: Edward Fella 99; back end-page, lower right corner: January 18/Edward Fella  00
inscribed: On cover page, in graphite:  SUMMER, FALL/Sketch Book #0/EDWARD FELLA/Start July 25, 1999  /finish January 18, 2000   Total:/  94 pgs/          My yellow/& Blue Book/(lines of black, red, green, blue inks)/"SIGNS TAKEN FOR POEMS/THAT/ DON'T/ WONDER"/Edward Fella(signature)/25682 ALMENDRA DRIVE/VALENCIA CALIF. 91355/ 661 253-1322/Studio: CAL ARTS School of Art/27400 McBEAN PKWY  VALENCIA/ CALIFORNIA 91355   661-255-1050 X 2621/In MICH:248-333-3679/1845 WELLINGTON   BLOOMFIELD HILLS/MICHIGAN 48302/Reward if returned ! (vertical to Michigan address: c/o LUCYBATES)
dimensions: Notebook page size: 20.2 x 12.3 cm (7 15/16 x 4 13/16 in.)
description: Black hardbound sketchbook with 95 leaves:  First leaf used as cover-page; following leaves are numbered 1-94.  On each recto, drawn image comprised of  lettering/word accretions; on each verso, poems (in graphite) refer to its companion image.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook, "Signs Taken for Poems That Don't Wonder", started July 25, 1999– finished January 18, 2000. Ball point pen and black, red, green, and blue inks, graphite on paper. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 2001-23-2
